name: RecapHoldRequestService
description: Lambda for the NYPL ReCAP Hold Request API Service

scripts.deploy-development: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/var_development.env -S config/event_sources_development.json -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 --profile nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-qa: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -b subnet-59bcdd03,subnet-5deecd15 -g sg-116eeb60 --profile nypl-digital-dev
scripts.deploy-production: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -b subnet-59bcdd03,subnet-5deecd15 -g sg-116eeb60 --profile nypl-digital-dev
